about.bottom1: {{brandType}} is a project within the <Link>Konveyor community</Link>.
about.bottom2: For more information, refer to <Link>{{brandType}} documentation</Link>.
about.description: {{brandType}} allows users to maintain their portfolio of applications with a full set of metadata and to assess their suitability for modernization leveraging a questionnaire based approach.
about.iconLibrary: The Icon Library used in this project is a derivative of the <Link href="https://www.redhat.com/en/about/brand/standards/icons/standard-icons">Standard Icons library</Link> by <Link href="https://www.redhat.com">Red Hat</Link>, used under <Link href="https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/">CC BY 4.0</Link>
about.introduction: {{brandType}} is a collection of tools that supports large-scale application modernization and migration projects to Kubernetes.

actions.clearRepositoryNotSupported: This action is disabled when RWX volumes are not available

composed.noDataStateBody: {{how}} a new {{what}} to start seeing data here.

message.retrieveConfigurations: Retrieve runtime configurations from source platforms for the selected applications.
message.applicationsBulkDelete: The selected application(s) will be deleted.
message.TasksBulkCancel: The selected task(s) will be canceled.
message.discardAssessment: The assessment(s) for {{applicationName}} will be discarded. Do you wish to continue?
message.discardReview: The review for {{applicationName}} will be discarded. Do you wish to continue?
message.leavePage: Are you sure you want to leave this page? Be sure to save your changes, or they will be lost.
message.refreshPage: Try to refresh your page or contact your admin.
message.maxfileSize: Max file size of 1MB exceeded. Upload a smaller file.
message.dragAndDropFile: Drag and drop your file here or upload one.
message.deleteQuestionnaire: Deleting a questionnaire will cascade into the deletion of all answered questionnaires associated to applications and/or archetypes.
message.updateApplications_two: Update the credentials for {{count}} applications: {{names, list}}
message.updateApplications_few: Update the credentials for {{count}} applications: {{names, list}}

message.affectedAppEffortTooltip: This column shows the calculated effort for all incidents related to this file.
message.applicationEffortTooltip: This column shows the total application effort.
message.appNotAssessedBody: In order to review an application it must be assessed first. Assess the application and try again.
message.archetypeAlreadyAssessed: An assessment for one or more of the archetypes this application is associated with exists.
message.archetypeAlreadyReviewed: A review for one or more of the archetypes this application is associated with exists. Open the details drawer to view the review(s).
message.archetypeNoApplications: No applications currently match the criteria tags.
message.assessmentStakeholderHeader: Select the stakeholder(s) or stakeholder group(s) associated with this assessment.
message.autoSelectTagsLabel: Automatically select tags based on the answers to the questionnaire.
message.autoSelectTooltip: Automatically select this answer based on tags associated with the application(s) or archetype.
message.autoTagTooltip: Automatically tag this application or archetype with these tags based on this answer to the questionnaire.
message.binaryPackaging: Packaging will default to JAR if left empty.
message.cancelNotAvailable: It is not possible to cancel a task that is in status {{statusName}}
message.cannotDeleteApplicationsAssignedToMigrat: Cannot delete applications that are assigned to a migration wave.
message.cannotDeleteJobFunctionWithStakeholders: Cannot remove a Job function associated with stakeholder(s)
message.cannotDeleteNonEmptyTagCategory: Cannot delete a tag category that contains tags.
message.cannotRemoveBusinessServiceAssociatedWit: Cannot remove a business service associated with application(s)
message.copyAssessmentAndReviewBody: Some of the selected target applications have an in-progress or complete assessment/review. By continuing, the existing assessment(s)/review(s) will be replaced by the copied assessment/review. Do you wish to continue?
message.copyAssessmentBody: Some of the selected target applications have an in-progress or complete assessment. By continuing, the existing assessment(s) will be replaced by the copied assessment. Do you wish to continue?
message.couldNotFetchBody: Resource doesn't exists or you don't have access to it
message.dependentQuestionTooltip: This question is conditionally included or excluded based on tags:
message.duplicateTag: A tag with this name already exists. Use a different name.
message.duplicateWave: The migration wave could not be created due to a conflict with an existing wave. Make sure the name and start/end dates are unique and try again.
message.editApplicationReviewConfirmation: This application has already been reviewed. Do you want to continue?
message.editArchetypeReviewConfirmation: This archetype has already been reviewed. Do you want to continue?
message.importErrorCheckDocumentation: For status Error imports, check the documentation to ensure your file is structured correctly.
message.inheritedAssessmentTooltip_one: This application is inheriting an assessment from an archetype.
message.inheritedAssessmentTooltip_other: This application is inheriting assessments from {{count}} archetypes.
message.inheritedReviewTooltip_one: This application is inheriting a review from an archetype.
message.inheritedReviewTooltip_other: This application is inheriting reviews from {{count}} archetypes.
message.insecureTracker: Insecure mode deactivates certificate verification. Use insecure mode for instances that have self-signed certificates.
message.issuesEffortTooltip: This column shows the effort weight for a single issue incident.
message.manageColumnsDescription: Select the columns you want to display in the table view.
message.manageDependenciesInstructions: Add northbound and southbound dependencies for the selected application here. Note that any selections made will be saved automatically. To undo any changes, you must manually delete the applications from the dropdowns.
message.noAnswers: Are you sure you want to close the assessment? There are no answers to save.
message.noArchetypesCreatedDescription: Create a new archetype to get started.
message.noAssociatedTags: This tag category has no associated tags.
message.noCodesSnippetAvailableBody: No code snippet was created for this incident.
message.noDataAvailableBody: No data available to be shown here.
message.noResultsFoundBody: No results match the filter criteria. Remove all filters or clear all filters to show results.
message.analysisProfileInUseWarning_one: This analysis profile is referenced by archetype {{archetypes}}. Deleting it will remove the reference from this archetype.
message.analysisProfileInUseWarning_other: This analysis profile is referenced by {{count}} archetypes: {{archetypes}}. Deleting it will remove the reference from these archetypes.
message.noTargetProfilesTitle: No target profiles have been created
message.noTargetProfilesDescription: Manage target profiles on the archetype to get started.
message.noTargetProfilesCreate: Create a new target profile to get started.
message.overrideArchetypeReviewConfirmation: Do you want to create a dedicated review for this application and override the inherited archetype review?
message.overrideArchetypeReviewDescription: The application {{name}} already is associated with archetypes: {{what}}.
message.overrideAssessmentConfirmation: Do you want to create a dedicated assessment for this application and override the inherited archetype assessment(s)?
message.overrideAssessmentDescription: The application {{name}} already is associated with archetypes: {{what}}.
message.platformNoApplications: No applications currently match the platform.
message.reasonForError: The reported reason for the error:
message.reviewInstructions: Use this section to provide your assessment of the possible migration/modernization plan and effort estimation.
message.selectedBecauseAppOrArchetypeTags: Selected because the application or archetype's tags include {{tags}}
message.selectedBecauseArchetypeTags: Selected because the archetype's tags include {{tags}}
message.selectOwnerFromStakeholdersList: Select owner from list of stakeholders
message.suggestedAdoptionPlanHelpText: The suggested approach to migration based on effort, priority, and dependencies.
message.taskInProgressForTags: A new analysis is in-progress.  Tags may be updated upon completion.
message.toTagApplication: Either no tags exist yet or you may not have permission to view any. If you have permission, try creating a new custom tag.
message.unsavedChanges: Are you sure you want to close the assessment? Any unsaved changes will be lost.

terms.analysisProfilesDescription: Create and manage analysis profiles. Analysis profiles allow you to save and reuse analysis configurations across multiple applications.
terms.customTargetsDetails: Create and manage custom migration targets. You can also drag and drop the cards to rearrange them. Note that any changes to the layout here will be reflected in the Analysis wizard
terms.reportDownloadSetting: Allow reports to be downloaded after running an analysis.
terms.impactfulButNotAdvisableToMove: Impactful but not advisable to move
terms.label: Label
terms.name: Name
terms.question: Question
terms.rejectedAppsAndDeps: Rejected applications and dependencies or unknown records
terms.settingsAllowApps: Allow reviewing applications without running an assessment first

success.assessmentAndReviewCopied: Success! Assessment and review copied to selected applications
success.assessmentCopied: Success! Assessment copied to selected applications
success.fileSavedToBeProcessed: Success! file saved to be processed.

fail.duplicateAnalysisProfileName: An analysis profile with the name "{{name}}" already exists.

tooltip.priority: Tasks priority, a non-negative number, impacts tasks scheduling policy. Lowest priority is 0. Higher priority tasks run before lower priority tasks.
tooltip.defaultIdentity: Credential {{name}} is the default credential for {{type}} types.

validation.email: This field requires a valid email.
validation.max: This field must be less than {{value}}.
validation.maxLength: This field must contain fewer than {{length}} characters.
validation.min: This field must be greater than {{value}}.
validation.minCount_one: At least one {{type}} must be selected.
validation.minLength: This field must contain at least {{length}} characters.
validation.minOneStakeholderOrGroupRequired: At least one stakeholder or stakeholder groups is required.
validation.url: This field requires a valid URL.
validation.duplicateName: A {{type}} with this name already exists. Use a different name.
validation.duplicateArchetypeName: An archetype with this name already exists. Use a different name.
validation.duplicateTargetProfileName: A target profile with this name already exists.
validation.duplicateAnalysisProfileName: An analysis profile with this name already exists.
validation.notOneOf: Value is not a valid option.
validation.repositoryTypeRequiredWhen: Repository type is required when URL, branch, or path is specified.
validation.repositoryUrlRequiredWhen: Repository URL is required when branch or path is specified.
validation.repositoryUrlInvalid: Must be a valid repository URL.

sourceMode.title: Source Code Mode
sourceMode.description: This mode focuses on analyzing the source code. Language-specific dependency configurations, like in Java's POM files, are not the primary focus and may not be fully analyzed.

label.customRules: Include rules for the analysis by uploading or importing from a repository.
label.manualModeDescription: Manually configure all analysis settings step by step.
label.noProfilesAvailableDescription: There are no analysis profiles available for the selected applications based on your access level.
label.notAllAnalyzableDetails: Some of the selected applications cannot be analyzed with the selected source because those values have not been defined. By continuing, these applications won't be included in the analysis.
label.profileModeDescription: Use a pre-configured analysis profile to run the analysis.
label.profileOptionsDescription: Configure additional options for the analysis.
label.reviewDetails: Review the information below, then run the analysis.
label.ruleFileRequiredDetails: At least one custom rule file is required if no targets are selected.
label.saveAsProfile: Save analysis options as an analysis profile?
label.saveAsProfileReview: Name of the analysis profile to save the analysis options as
label.scope: Select the scope of dependencies you want to include in the analysis.
label.scopeAllDeps: Application and all dependencies, including known Open Source libraries
label.scopeSelectDeps: Add the list of packages to be analyzed
label.selectWizardMode: Choose how to configure the analysis.
label.setTargets: Select one or more target options in focus for the analysis.
label.skipTargets: Target selection can be skipped if custom rules file(s) are used

tooltip.advancedAnalysisDetails: Enable enhanced analysis details to get more information about the analysis.

review.title: Review analysis details
review.description: Review the information below, then run the analysis.
review.profileDescription: Review the analysis profile configuration, then run the analysis.

retrieveConfigWizard.title: Retrieve Configurations
retrieveConfigWizard.description: Retrieve configurations from the selected applications.
retrieveConfigWizard.noApplicationsWithSourcePlatforms: No applications with source platforms selected.

results.title: Configuration Retrieval Results
results.summary: Summary of configuration retrieval task submissions.

review.description_one: This application is ready to retrieve configurations from its source platform. The application's platform coordinates will be used to connect to the platform and build the application's discovery manifest.
review.description_other: These applications are ready to retrieve configurations from their source platforms. The applications' platform coordinates will be used to connect to the platform and build the applications' discovery manifests.

platformDiscoverWizard.title: Discover Applications
platformDiscoverWizard.description: Discover and import applications from a source platform.
platformDiscoverWizard.noPlatformSelectedDescription: A source platform must be selected to continue.

platformSelect.title: Select a platform
platformSelect.description: Select a platform to access for application discovery and import.

filterInput.title: Configure Discovery Filters
filterInput.description: Configure the filters for discovering applications on platform {{platformName}} ({{platformKind}}). These filters will determine which applications are discovered and imported.
filterInput.noFiltersAvailable: No discovery filters are available for platform kind {{platformKind}}.

review.title: Review Platform Discovery
review.description: Review the platform and discovery filters before starting application discovery on {{platformName}}.

results.title: Platform Discovery Results
results.summary: Summary of platform application discovery task submissions.

generateAssetsWizard.title: Generate Assets
generateAssetsWizard.description_other: Generate deployment assets for {{count}} selected applications.
generateAssetsWizard.noApplicationsReady: No applications are ready for asset generation. Applications must have completed configuration retrieval and have target platforms configured.
generateAssetsWizard.noTasksSubmitted: No asset generation tasks were submitted.

selectTargetProfile.title: Select a target profile
selectTargetProfile.description_one: Select a target profile from the list of available target profiles for {{first}}.
selectTargetProfile.description_other: Select a target profile from the list of target profiles available to all {{count}} selected applications
selectTargetProfile.noProfilesAvailable: No target profiles are available from any of the application archetypes.

captureParameters.title: Input user parameters
captureParameters.description_zero: The selected target profile {{name}} does not include a generator that requires user input.
captureParameters.description_one: The selected target profile {{name}} includes a generator that requires user input.
captureParameters.description_other: The selected target profile {{name}} includes {{count}} generators that require user input.
captureParameters.noTargetProfileSelected: No target profile selected.  Please select a target profile to continue.
captureParameters.noParametersRequired: No user input parameters are required for this target profile.

advancedOptions.title: Advanced options
advancedOptions.renderTemplatesPopover: When generating assets, each generator can output a helm chart and values.yaml file or a set of assets from the templates. This selection allows you to choose the output of the generators.
advancedOptions.renderTemplates-false: Render to helm charts and values.yaml

review.title: Review details
review.description_one: This application is ready to use {{targetProfile}} to generate assets. Assets will be generated based on the application's discovery manifest, target profile, input parameters, and generator settings.
review.description_other: These applications are ready to use {{targetProfile}} to generate assets. Assets will be generated based on the applications' discovery manifests, target profile, input parameters, and generator settings.

results.title: Asset Generation Results
results.summary: Summary of asset generation task submissions.

delete.deleteInUse: This credential is explicitly use by {{attached, list}}. Deleting this credential will remove it from these items. This action cannot be undone.
delete.warnDeleteInUse: Cannot delete {{what}} because it is explicitly associated with {{attached, list}}.

default.mavenSwitchLabel: Use as the maven settings file credential if an application does not have one assigned?
default.mavenChangeWarning: Credential {{name}} is currently set as the maven settings file default credential. Selecting this credential as the default will apply to all applications without an explicitly set maven settings file credential.
default.sourceSwitchLabel: Use as the source control credential if an application does not have one assigned?
default.sourceChangeWarning: Credential {{name}} is currently set as the source control default credential. Selecting this credential as the default will apply to all applications without an explicitly set source control credential.

confirm.setAsDefaultMessage: Credential {{name}} is currently set as the {{typeString}} default credential. Setting this credential as the default will apply to all {{typeString}} type credential uses where the credential is not explicitly set.
confirm.removeDefaultMessage: This credential will no longer be used as the default credential for {{typeString}} types.

cloudfoundry.label: Cloud Foundry
cloudfoundry.credentialTooltip: Use credential of type source control
